\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 22221}

\subsection*{Super Aphrodesiac}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Long Time User}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 5.0 mg & oral & Yohimbe & capsule\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 140.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I dose about 5 mg a half hour before I have sex. I have had some rather intense episodes prior to figuring out a standard dose. One can become rather cranked up on too much. 



I am 49 yrs old and can achieve a very hard and super sensitive erection using the above. Aditionally, I have had up to four huge ejaculating orgasms in 1/2 hour (at my age!) without losing the erection. This is no BS. 



This substance also works for females. My wife has reported way more intense orgasms. I notice much more moisture and tightness (due to swollen erectile tissue). Her clitoris can become twice the usual. Women should start with only 2mg.



This is the only substance that I have found to really come close to a true aphrodesiac.
